dsOverview.title: ECMWF FGGE TD101 Global Reanalyses, SOP 1 and 2, 1979

summary.p: ECMWF reanalyses of the FGGE Special Observation Periods (SOP: 1979Jan10 - 1979Mar05 and 1979May05 - 1979Jul31) based on FGGE IIIb, 1985 version. No plans to do the rest of the FGGE year (as of April 1989). These are the 1986Dec versions of the analyses, and are the initialized grids.
